### Experience

```{r experience}
experience$dates <- gsub("\'", "20", experience$dates) 
experience$dates <- gsub("-", " - ", experience$dates)
  
experience$description_formatted <- 
    with(
      experience,
      paste0(
        "**", role, "**<br>", dates, "<br>",
        "*", org, "*<br>", place))

cat(paste(experience$description_formatted, collapse = "<br><br>"))
```
